name: JWSTransactionDecodedPayload
desc: A decoded payload containing transaction information.

items.name: appAccountToken
items.desc: A UUID that associates the transaction with a user on your own service. If your app doesn’t provide an appAccountToken, this string is empty. For more information, see appAccountToken(_:).

items.name: bundleId
items.desc: The bundle identifier of the app.

items.name: environment
items.desc: The server environment, either sandbox or production.

items.name: expiresDate
items.desc: The UNIX time, in milliseconds, the subscription expires or renews.

items.name: inAppOwnershipType
items.desc: A string that describes whether the transaction was purchased by the user, or is available to them through Family Sharing.

items.name: isUpgraded
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the user upgraded to another subscription.

items.name: offerIdentifier
items.desc: The identifier that contains the promo code or the promotional offer identifier.

items.name: offerType
items.desc: A value that represents the promotional offer type.

items.name: originalPurchaseDate
items.desc: The UNIX time, in milliseconds, that represents the purchase date of the original transaction identifier.

items.name: originalTransactionId
items.desc: The transaction identifier of the original purchase.

items.name: productId
items.desc: The product identifier of the in-app purchase.

items.name: purchaseDate
items.desc: The UNIX time, in milliseconds, that the App Store charged the user’s account for a purchase, restored product, subscription, or subscription renewal after a lapse.

items.name: quantity
items.desc: The number of consumable products the user purchased.

items.name: revocationDate
items.desc: The UNIX time, in milliseconds, that the App Store refunded the transaction or revoked it from Family Sharing.

items.name: revocationReason
items.desc: The reason that the App Store refunded the transaction or revoked it from Family Sharing.

items.name: signedDate
items.desc: The UNIX time, in milliseconds, that the App Store signed the JSON Web Signature (JWS) data.

items.name: subscriptionGroupIdentifier
items.desc: The identifier of the subscription group the subscription belongs to.

items.name: transactionId
items.desc: The unique identifier of the transaction.

items.name: type
items.desc: The type of the in-app purchase.

items.name: webOrderLineItemId
items.desc: The unique identifier of subscription purchase events across devices, including subscription renewals.
